channel.title: Modeling on Guy Cutting
channel.description: Recent content in Modeling on Guy Cutting

item.title: Self Organized Criticality Economics
item.description: Self-Organized Criticality Economic Model github repo Project report (PDF) with experimental results and analysis After finishing my Master’s in Systems Science at PSU, I now have some time to work on my website! Over the next few weeks I’m going to be posting some code and links to past projects. I’d like to start with a project from my Artificial Life class this term - it’s a simple Agent-Based economic model based on a Self-Organized Criticality mechanism.
